document.full_text: german prosecutors said on monday they were appealing against a court decision to free convicted nazi death camp guard john demjanjuk, while german investigators pursued at least two similar cases.
document.title: german prosecutors appeal john demjanjuk release
lines_and_colors: german prosecutors said on monday they were appealing against a court decision to free convicted nazi death camp guard john demjanjuk, while german investigators pursued at least two similar cases.
